metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6073 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the TXT record-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsing the RDATA section in a TXT record in mDNS messages, multiple integer overflows can be triggered, leading to a denial of service. An attacker can send an mDNS message to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: vlc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
